---
title: "Gzip output files"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
samples_path <- "/mnt/data/NGS/Projects/MCL-scrnaseq/MCL-PhanthomMenace/scrnaseq-alignment/output"

sample_dirs <- list.dirs(samples_path, recursive = F, full.names = F)

raw_paths <- file.path(
  samples_path,
  sample_dirs,
  paste0(sample_dirs, "_Solo.out"),
  "Gene",
  "raw"
)

for(raw_path in raw_paths){
  cat("Zipping files in", raw_path)
  system(
    paste0("gzip ", raw_path, "/*")
  )
}
cat("Done")
```
